Reform UK and Bolton For Change
- Paul Gannon
- Nov 21, 2021
- 2 min read
Updated: Dec 6, 2021
Dear Constituent,
I would like to take this time to introduce ourselves and tell you a little bit about who we are and our aims. Reform UK and Bolton For Change are two newly formed political parties that derived from dissatisfaction at both national and local levels. The last few years have been hard for the majority of us, we have seen a rise in foodbanks, unemployment, homelessness, we have watched the erosion of our health services, access to GPs and more and more loss of our rights. I think we can agree change in administration and reform is needed. We are on our knees.
Trevor Jones has lived in Bolton all his life, was disheartened with the rundown of his town, watching the poverty get wider, along with no political will for change. Trevor first walked into politics in 2016 - this is not a political career for Trevor. He is passionate about his town and people which is why he started Bolton for Change. Reform UK was created with the same philosophies and passion for change. We cannot keep jumping from Tory to Labour, when each is as bad as the other, there has to be a third alternative if we want change.
Bolton For Change and Reform UK believe that by cross party working we can be a force to be reckoned with and with your support we can have a voice at both local and national level.
The next election is May 2022 and we are hoping to have as many candidates as possible, but for that we need you. If like us you are sick and tired of the old regime, then please come forward and stand with us as a candidate, be part of a passionate team that is willing to fight for change.
Thank you for taking the time to read this, Bolton For Change and Reform UK look forward to your support.

ABOUT
'Introducing a political party for the people of Bolton'
Our town has lots of problems, and the hard-working people in our town deserve so much better.
For far too long nothing has improved, in fact, at times, it feels as if we have gone backwards.
The proud people of Bolton are tired of what our Town has become, and the way in which it has been failed
by representatives of the existing, tired, outdated and out of touch national political offering.
These representatives have been controlled by their parties and have often put their national party’s
interests and ideologies before that of the people they were elected to represent.
There comes a time when you have to say 'Enough Is Enough'.
The only way to improve things is to change things.
That is why we have formed:
BOLTON FOR CHANGE
A local political party, to truly represent and serve the people of Bolton.

ABOUT
Continuation:
Bolton For Change is registered as a political party with the Electoral Commission PP11460.
Although initially set up by two former candidates of the Brexit party, Bolton For Change is not an extension, it is a fresh start, a Local party focusing on Local Issues.
With Brexit almost done, and with the Labour party on life support after turning their backs on their once grassroots voters, many people feel politically homeless.
Bolton For Change now offers you a ‘New’ political home, a real alternative, without labels, Leaver, Remainer does not matter as-long-as you are 100% committed to improving Bolton.
Initially, we had hoped to put up candidates in at least 14 of the 20 wards up for grabs at the next Local council Election, however, with the amount of interest that we have already received from both possible candidates and supporters, it may be possible to field a candidate within each ward.
Three sitting Councillors have also shown interest in joining us.
If you would like to join us or would like further information, please get in touch with our Team via the contact information on this website.
Mission Statement
AMBITION - OPPORTUNITIES - SUPPORT
The ‘’Bolton for Change’’ Party has been set up to promote the interests of the people of Bolton both at local and national level.
We want our voice to be heard, and to make real change within our town which benefits all members of our community.
While we must support those most vulnerable within our community, we must also provide them with the tools and opportunities to improve their own lives.
Improvements to our local infrastructure are key to a brighter future for our Town, as it will provide critical support for our local economy, unlock our potential, and enabling residents to access new education, skills, and work opportunities.
Together, we have the power to inspire AMBITION, by providing OPPORTUNITIES and SUPPORT for everyone with our community.

JOIN US
There are currently no paid employees within Bolton For Change, and we rely solely on the goodwill and enthusiasm of all our members in every activity we undertake.
Every volunteer plays a vital role within the party as we move forward and are vital to ensuring our success at the Local Elections.
The future of Bolton For Change is in the hands of our members, so no matter how little or how much time you can spare, it will be greatly appreciated.
Just a few of the different ways to Get Involved:
Leafleter
As a Leafleter, you would be responsible for an area of residential addresses and would undertake hand deliveries of the Party’s campaign literature. This will, where possible, be within your local area!
Campaign Days
We will be holding Campaign Days throughout Bolton. You will be part of a small team manning a Street Stall, handing out literature and engaging with members of the public within our community!
Canvasser
Canvassing is a particularly important part of any campaign and allows us to gain vital information about the electorate’s voting intentions, worries and concerns, etc. This information enables us to campaign effectively and gives us the opportunity to engage one to one with our voters. Canvassing will be carried out in pairs and training and support will be given!
Let us know how you would like to get involved, tell us about any of your skills which could be utilised by the Party, etc, and a member of our team will get in contact with you as soon as possible.
Thank You in Advance
